title: Microsoft Visual Studio Pro Discounted To Only $36 This Week
description: If you've ever wanted to create your own mobile apps, websites, or desktop software, StackCommerce's limited-time deal on Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022 is worth checking out. Through March 10, you can snag a lifetime license for only $36 with promo code ENJOY20. The license has a retail price of $500 or a monthly membership cost of $45; needless to say, if the Professional version of Visual Studio is up your alley, you'll save a lot of money by opting for this deal.

title: The Best Deals Ahead Of Mario Day: Save On Games, Toys, And More
description: Mario Day is right around the corner on March 10, and while we're still waiting for most of the official deals to go live, there are a bunch of great discounts to peruse ahead of the event. Whether you're in the market for a new Switch game, a Lego Mario expansion set, or a snuggly plush, there's a bunch of Mario gear on sale ahead of the plumber's big day. One cool deal for longtime fans is for the Super Mario Encyclopedia, which is filled with 256 pages of Mario knowledge and is now just $21 (down from $40). You'll also find the Super Mario Bros. Movie Collectible Steelbook back in stock at Walmart for $28--though we're sure it'll sell out fas

title: Call Of Duty MW3 And Warzone Dune: Rule Of Fate - All Rewards And Challenges
description:
The Dune: Rule Of Fate crossover event is live in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone for Season 2 Reloaded, bringing another opportunity to earn Dune-themed cosmetics and rewards. These include items such as the Ceremony's Blade weapon charm, House Corrino emblem, and the Full Shields weapon camo. Here we highlight all the rewards and their unlock requirements.



Emperor's Arrival - Weapon sticker

This Dune sticker is unlocked at 10,000 XP earned.

title: Suits Is Getting A Blu-Ray Box Set With Tons Of Special Features
description:
The full nine-season run of the popular legal drama Suits is coming to Blu-ray. The 35-disc collection will include all 134 episodes and tons of special features. Suits: The Complete Series Blu-ray launches on March 19, and preorders are available now.

Preorder Suits: The Complete Series Blu-ray

$110

title: CoD: Modern Warfare 3 And Warzone - How To Unlock The Soulrender
description:
The Season 2 Reloaded update is live in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone, bringing a crossover with Warhammer 40,000, more MP maps, new Warzone features, and another Zombies story mission. This update also includes the new Soulrender melee weapon. Here we'll guide you through all the ways to unlock it.

How to unlock the Soulrender

The Soulrender is described as a "ceremonial blade capable of razor-sharp cuts and deadly melee action in close-quarters combat." Activision says the Soulrender offers "rapid slashing attacks" via the aim button and a heavier primary attack by holding the fire button, which you can combo together for maximum damage.

This weapon is included as part of a new bonus challenge sector in the Season 2 battle pass, which includes a series of c

title: The Sinking City 2 Goes From Mystery To Full Horror In Reveal Trailer
description:
Frogwares has revealed The Sinking City 2, and this time, the studio is going all in on horror for its Lovecraftian sequel. While 2019's The Sinking City was an action-adventure game with mystery elements and a constant sense of dread--and an infamous dispute with Nacon--The Sinking City 2 is taking on a darker and more aggressive form according to the studio.

"The Sinking City is one of our most successful titles, because of our stronger horror genre leanings and the setting," Frogwares Head of Publishing Sergey Oganesyan said to Xbox Wire. "For us, it was kind of a breakthrough, and we are super excited to work on a full-scale horror game."

Detective work isn't being thrown out, as you will still be able to use your cunning to solve optional puz

title: Dune 2 Screened For Dying Man Who Passed Away Just Days Later
description:
One man's dying wish was to see Dune: Part Two, and the filmmakers made that happen just days before he did in fact pass away. Canada's Global News reported that a man in end-of-life care in northern Quebec made it known to staff that he was a big movie fan and wanted to see the film before he passed on. After a social media post picked up steam, the care facility was able to get in touch with director Denis Villeneuve's team and they helped make it happen.

Producer Tanya Lapointe, who is married to Villeneuve, offered to fly the man to Los Angeles or have him attend the premiere in Montreal. However, the man was "at the end," his care worker told the publication.

So in January, Villeneuve's assistant flew to the palliative care facility with a copy of the film on a laptop. "It was a race against time because from one day to the next, we didn't know if he would make it.

title: CoD: Modern Warfare 3 And Warzone - How To Unlock The SOA Subverter Battle Rifle
description:
Season 2 Reloaded is live in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone, and the big update brings a crossover with Warhammer 40,000, more MP maps, new Warzone features, and another Zombies story mission. This update also adds the SOA Subverter battle rifle. Here we'll guide you through all the ways to unlock this new gun.

How to unlock the SOA Subverter

The SOA Subverter is described as a hard-hitting rifle that dominates at mid- to longer-ranges with a low rate of fire and predictable recoil. This new battle rifle can be unlocked for free by completing in-game challenges.

The base version can be unlocked by completing any five weekly challenges from the Week 5 challenge list. There are 21 challenges in total for the week, spanning multiplayer, Zombies, and Warzone, but

title: Persona 3 Reload Expansion Pass Adds New Ending, Is Free With Xbox Game Pass
description:
Persona 3 Reload developer Atlus has announced that a three-step expansion pass for the game is on the way. The studio shared the news during Xbox's Partner Preview Showcase, as well as confirmed what content the pass will include and when each wave of new material will be released. Xbox also revealed that the expansion will be available for free to all Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers until January 31, 2025. However, those without a Game Pass subscription can still purchase the expansion pass on Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, and PC for $35.

The first part of the expansion is set to release on March 12 and adds 16 fan-favorite tracks from across Persona 4 Golden and Persona 5 Royal to Persona 3 Reload. Players will then be able to listen to the following songs as background music while exploring and bat

title: Rooster Teeth Shutting Down After Two Decades, Is Looking To Sell-Off Red Vs. Blue
description:
Rooster Teeth, the entertainment company behind the popular Halo parody Red vs. Blue and magical girl action-series RWBY, is shutting down after 21 years.

The news was announced at an all-hands meeting on March 6 alongside a staff-wide memo from Rooster Teeth general manager Jordan Levin, according to Variety. The memo states the company's closure came as a result of "challenges facing digital media resulting from fundamental shifts in consumer behavior and monetization across platforms, advertising, and patronage."

Warner Bros. Discovery is in talks to sell-off some of Rooster Teeth's most popular intellectual property, including Red vs. Blue. The show popularized machinima with its use of the Halo game series to tell its story and put Rooster Teeth on the map back when it started in 2003, the same year the company was founded.

title: Call Of Duty Mobile Season 3 Adds New Operator Skill, SMG, And MP Map
description:
Season 3 aims to turn back time with a vintage theme for Call of Duty Mobile, and Activision's latest blog post details what that entails. As per the blog post, a new battle pass, operator skill, DLC weapon, and multiplayer map are on the way.

Call of Duty Mobile Season 3: Vintage Vigilance arrives on March 13 at 5 PM PT / 8 PM ET. This new season includes a brand-new battle pass with 50 tiers of free and premium items, including new operator skins, weapon blueprints, CoD Points, and various cosmetics themed around mobsters and vintage style.

The highlights of the free battle pass tiers include a new operator skill and submachine gun. Originally featured in Black Ops Cold War, the TEC-9 semi-automatic submachine gun

title: Kunitsu-Gami: Path Of The Goddess Coming To Xbox Game Pass This Year
description:
During its March 2024 Partner Preview, Xbox announced that Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess is launching for Xbox Series X|S, PS5, and PC this year. The game will be available on day one on Xbox Game Pass.

Developed by Capcom, Path of the Goddess sees you play Soh, a masked warrior tasked with defending the villages around Mt. Kafuku. The game is divided into two different styles of play: Daytime and Nighttime. During the day, Soh must fight their way to trapped villagers and work to free them, recruiting additional fighters to the cause and creating more defenses for your home base. At night, Soh must rely on those defenses while fighting off hordes of enemy spirits. This adds an element of real-time strategy to what's otherwise an action-adventure game.

The Xbox

title: Frostpunk 2 Release Date Set For July 2024
description:
Frostpunk 2 has an official release date, as developer 11 Bit Studios has confirmed the game will launch on July 25 for PC and will be available day-one on Game Pass for PC. A real-time strategy game where you battle against time, global cooling, and rebellious elements in the populace, anyone looking for an early taste of Frostpunk 2 can play a seven-day beta in April if they preorder the digital deluxe edition.

Developer 11 Bit Studios also confirmed post-launch plans for Frostpunk 2, as the game will receive three pieces of paid-for DLC. These will be included with the digital deluxe edition as well, alongside the base game, the Warm Flesh digital novella, digital artbook, soundtrack, and early access to the story mode 72 hours before the official release.

Set in a world where an eternal winter has almost driven humanity to extinction, one last city holds out against the cold. Fro

title: Stalker Trilogy Announced, Out Today For $40
description:
The Xbox Partner Preview broadcast contained a special surprise, as Microsoft announced the Stalker: Legends of the Zone Trilogy, and it's out today on console for Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One. This was leaked earlier this week for PlayStation as well.

The bundle includes the Stalker games Shadow of Chernobyl, Clear Sky, and Call of Pripyat. The games are available in a package for $40 or individually for $20 each. Obviously, if you want all three, buying the bundle is the way to go in terms of cost.

"Every element from the original games has been maintained and faithfully ported to console thanks to the hard work of GSC Game World and their partners at Mataboo," Microsoft said.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Final Fantasy XIV's Full Xbox Release Date Confirmed Alongside Free Game Pass Expansions
description:
Final Fantasy XIV is coming to Xbox Series X|S on March 21, following an extended beta period. Square Enix showed off a new trailer for the popular MMORPG on a Xbox Partner Presents stream, including a teaser that Xbox Game Pass owners will get some extra bonus perks.

From March 21 through April 19, you can claim a Starter Edition through Game Pass Ultimate perks. That version includes the base game, along with its first two expansions, Heavensward and Stormblood. In the meantime before release, the beta is still available to try out the game.

Final Fantasy XIV has been a success story for Square Enix over the last ten years. While the game originally released in 2010, the reception was largely negative and Square Enix took the criticisms to heart. It buckled down on a totally revised version, which it named A Realm Reborn, and relaunched in 2013. That revised version of the game was praised as a vast improvement, and it has gained a steady following on PC and

title: Xbox Partner Preview March 2024: All The Biggest Announcements
description:
Microsoft is back with a new Xbox showcase this month, shining a spotlight on games from third-party studios and publishers. The Xbox Partner Preview will feature a new look at games like Capcom's Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess, action-RPG The First Berserker: Khazan from Nexon, and more in a 30-minute broadcast.

This will be a focused livestream, with new game reveals, release date announcements, and fresh gameplay for upcoming titles showcased. As usual, GameSpot will be covering the event and you can read up on the latest reveals, or refresh this page for a brief update on all the games coming to Xbox consoles and PC, and which of these games will be popping up on Game Pass.

Focused livestreams like this have been surprisingly plentiful in 2024, as Nintendo recently hosted a new

title: Creatures Of Ava Lets You Save The World With Animals And Music
description:
Today during the Xbox Partner Preview, Spanish game studios Inverge and Chibig--by way of publisher 11-bit Studios--revealed Creatures Of Ava, a new action-adventure game where players will use music to tame and work with the wildlife of the world. 11-bit also announced the game will be available on both PC Game Pass and Xbox Game Pass at launch this year.

Creatures Of Ava puts players in the role of Vic, a young adventurer who has partnered with a researcher named Tabitha to investigate the "Withering"--a plague that's infecting the world. Animals infected by the plague become hostile, and Vic must work to rid the world of the Withering and restore the natural order.

Players will travel through the vast world of Ava, where they will use a flute to soothe, heal, and work with the different types of wildlife in order to progress the story. The game focuses on non-aggressive tactics throughout the story--which ha

title: First Gameplay For Sci-Fi Adventure The Alters Revealed, Day-One Game Pass Confirmed
description:
During today's Xbox Partner Preview, 11 Bit Studios unveiled the first gameplay trailer for The Alters, a sci-fi survival game that focuses heavily on player choice. The studio also announced that the game will be available on both PC Game Pass and Xbox Game Pass at launch later this year.

The Alters stars Jan Dolski, a space explorer who crash lands on a hostile planet and finds himself alone on a space station that requires a full crew to operate. Soon, he finds a new and rare substance called Rapidium, which allows him to create alternate versions of himself based on choices he'd made previously in his life, and then he must work with these new versions of himself in order to survive.

Players will team with the Alters to mine for resources that will be used to maintain the station, craft items needed to survive, and more throughout the adventure. Each created Alter effectively becomes a new NPC in the world,

title: New Xbox Game Pass Title Sleight Of Hand Is A Noir, Stealth-Focused Deck Builder
description:
Sleight of Hand is a new third-person stealth game coming to Xbox Game Pass. Announced during the Xbox Partner Showcase, Sleight of Hand is a third-person stealth game with a noir setting, with focus on deck building.

The announcement trailer showed a woman, named Lady Luck, using special playing cards to create mist, freeze a man, and even teleport, while investigating a smuggling operation. The Steam page notes that the cards will be used to get through stealth levels, providing special abilities like traps and scouting. The cards will have limited uses, forcing you to make tactical choices with these special abilities.

Lady Luck uses a variety of smoke-based magic cards, allowing her to make stealth-focused maneuvers and use special combos to take

title: COD Leak Reveals Cheech & Chong, Devin Booker Operators Are Coming (And Snoop Dogg Is Returning)
description:
Now that Call of Duty's big new Season 2 Reloaded update has arrived, some enterprising fans have dug through the code and discovered clues about what's to come in the future. A datamining effort from Bob Network UK has revealed that the stoner duo Cheech and Chong might be coming to the game as playable operators, as well as NBA player Devin Booker.

The datamine also suggested that a Snoop Dogg Operator bundle is returning to the game.

Data miners have found references to Cheech & Chong, Snoop Dogg (returning), and Devin Booker coming to MWIII and Warzone.
(Via

title: Rocket League Season 14 Is Live, Goes Under The Sea
description:
Developer Psyonix has announced that Season 14 has started for Rocket League. That means a new battle pass, two car body additions, patch notes, and even a fresh arena called AquaDome (Salty Shallows) are now available in the free-to-play game that mixes cars with soccer.

The Admiral and Mako car bodies are part of the Season 14 battle pass. Psyonix notes that these rides will eventually be available in Fortnite as well, meaning your purchase would carry over to the battle royale game. The latest Rocket League trailer--seen below--showcases other new customization options for your vehicles, like an angry Octopus topper and purple coral wheels. The reaction to the video on YouTube is pretty negative, saying the arena is just a variant that adds grass.

Rocket League isn't the only car-centric game from Psyonix these days. The developer also is continuously working on

title: Harrison Ford's Doctors Played Indiana Jones Theme Music When He Had A Colonoscopy
description:
One of Harrison Ford's most iconic roles is that of the archaeologist-adventurer Indiana Jones, a film series that features iconic music created by the legend John Williams. Ford cannot escape this music. It was even playing when he had his latest colonoscopy.

"As I often remind John, his music follows me everywhere I go--literally," Ford told Variety. "When I had my last colonoscopy, they were playing it on the operating room speakers."

Williams is known for creating the theme music for not only Indiana Jones, but also Star Wars, Jurassic Park, Harry Potter, Home Alone, and more. At age 92, he's still working and earning praise. He's nominated for his 54th Academy Award for the music for Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny.

title: Ghost Of Tsushima Director's Cut Hits PC In May With Extra Features
description:
Sucker Punch has announced that Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut will be released for PC on May 16. It includes the full game, the Iki Island expansion, and the online multiplayer Legends mode.

The PC version supports ultrawide monitors, and is optimized for both 21:9 and 32:9 resolutions, as well as 48:9 resolutions for triple monitor setups.

It also features several performance-enhancing technologies, such as NVIIDA DLSS 3 and AMD FSR 3 for upscaling and frame generation. Intel XeSS upscaling and NVIDIA DLAA and FSR 3 Native AA are supported too.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Super Mario Bros. Movie Steelbook Edition Back In Stock, But You Should Hurry
description: At long last, the Super Mario Bros. Movie steelbook edition is back in stock, as you can pick up a fresh 4K Blu-ray of the hit animated film at Walmart. This isn't just the film in its highest-quality format either, as you'll be getting the sought-after Power-Up Edition for $28. In addition to the movie and all of its extras, this package includes a charming steelbook with the iconic Super Mario Bros. Mushroom on the cover.

title: CoD: Warzone And MW3 Season 2 Reloaded Patch Notes Include Space Marines And Aiming Changes
description:
The Season 2 Reloaded update for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone adds new maps, more Zombies content, additional Warzone features, and Space Marines. The patch notes for the big update also include bug fixes, weapon balancing, and changes to aiming across Warzone and Modern Warfare 3.

Season 2 Reloaded adds two new DLC weapons to unlock with the SOA Subverter battle rifle and Soulrender melee weapon. The midseason is also packed with three events themed around Warhammer 40,000, Dune, and more Zombies action. More details on Season 2 Reloaded's content can be found here, including more maps and new game modes.

According to the patch notes, a change was made

title: Netflix's Avatar: The Last Airbender Renewed For Seasons 2 And 3
description:
The Aang gang will return for two more seasons. Netflix has officially announced the renewal of Avatar: The Last Airbender, meaning the live-action series will get to complete the story based on the animated Nickelodeon show.

The official Netflix account on X (formerly known as Twitter) revealed that Seasons 2 and 3 have been greenlit for Avatar: The Last Airbender. The streaming service added that the show has over 41 million views after premiering February 22. It's also been the No. 1 series in 76 countries across the world.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: James Gunn Quashes Wonder Woman Theory About Who Will Play The Role Next
description:
A rumor making the rounds that claims Elizabeth Debicki could take over for Gal Gadot and become the next Wonder Woman has been debunked by DC Studios co-head James Gunn.

Gunn said on social media (via GamesRadar) that he has "never even had this thought." Gunn and Debicki worked together on the Guardians of the Galaxy film series in which Debicki played Ayesha. Gunn said he has enjoyed his time working with Debicki, but the Wonder Woman rumor is not true.

According to an October 2023 report from Variety, Gadot will not come back to play Wonder Woman again, as Gunn is kickstarting a new DC roster. This report came just a few months after Gadot said she was <

title: Amid Taylor Swift Rumors, Deadpool And Wolverine Actor Teases Many Cameos
description:
Actor Karan Soni is coming back to play Dopinder once again in Deadpool and Wolverine, and now he's teased more of what to expect from the upcoming film. Speaking to Variety, Soni said the new film is "ultra-secretive," but he could say that there will be many cameos.

"There are a lot of surprises," he said. "Let's just say a lot of people traveled to London [where the movie was filmed]."

Some of the rumors so far include Jennifer Garner coming back to play Elektra and Taylor Swift playing Dazzler. Director Shawn Levy previously discussed how

title: 16 Advanced Combat Tips And Tricks - Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth
description: Max has spend 140 hours with Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth and has some deeper insight into what to focus on to help you stay one step ahead of your enemies.

title: Helldivers 2 Creative Director Dismisses Sony Acquisition Scuttlebutt
description:
The PlayStation family won't be growing with the addition of Helldivers 2 studio Arrowhead, it seems. The developer's CEO, Johan Pilestedt, shot down rumors his company was being acquired by Sony.

Spotted by Eurogamer, Pilestedt responded on X (formerly known as Twitter) to someone asking if Arrowhead Game Studios might be joining PlayStation as a first-party developer. The Helldivers 2 creative director outright denied the scuttlebutt: "This is fake," he said. Pilestedt even replied to another person who claimed Arrowhead "sold out to Sony," saying, "this would be the first hear I about it."

This is fake... Unless I've missed so

title: WWE Adds Japanese Legend Bull Nakano To 2024 Hall Of Fame Class
description:
Bull Nakano won professional wrestling championships in three different countries, becoming a wrestling icon and breaking the mold for women wrestlers. This April, the former All Japan Pro Wrestling and former WWE Women's Champion will take her place in the WWE Hall of Fame.

With her skyscraper hair and face paint, Nakano found herself as one of the biggest stars in Japan. She won the AJW championship and WWWA title during that time, with huge matches against--and tagging with--the likes of future Japanese wrestling legends Dump Matsumoto, Kyoko Inoue, Akira Hokuto, and, of course, Aja Kong.

An unbelievable talent with an unforgettable look, and a mean streak a mile long.
Bull Nakano isnâ€™t just one of the best Womenâ€™s wrestlers of all time - sheâ€™s one of the best of all time, period. #WWEHOF

title: Save Big On Dragon's Dogma 2 PC Preorders, And Get A Free Game
description:
Dragon's Dogma fans have waited over 10 years for a sequel to Capcom's cult-hit action-RPG, but the wait is finally (nearly) over. Dragon's Dogma 2 launches March 22 for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S. If you're planning on playing Dragon's Dogma 2 on PC, you can save big on your copy of the standard or deluxe edition.

Preorder Standard Edition

title: Helldivers 2 Gets Lethal Planetary Conditions In New Patch
description:
A new patch has gone live for Helldivers 2, adding new and hazardous planetary conditions to spoil your liber-tea party on distant worlds. According to developer Arrowhead, players can expect "additional environmental challenges" when they deploy to the surface, including meteor showers, fiery tornados, and more. The other big change awaiting players when they boot up Helldivers 2 after the patch is an all-encompassing rebalance of the game.

Some of these changes are subtle, others are major like the Eradicate missions requiring more kills and throwing more enemies at you, roughly doubling the length of this mode. In the weapons department, Arrowhead has adjusted the efficacy of the Breaker, Railgun, and Shield Generator backpack, as this combo of equipment has overshadowed other options in Helldivers 2. The Breaker now has a decreased magazine capacity and increased recoil, while the Railgun will deal less damage to durable enemies.

The good news is that flame

title: Another John Wick TV Series Is In The Works
description:
Following The Continental, another John Wick spin-off TV series is in the works. Lionsgate executive Michael Burns said this week during a Morgan Stanley speaking event (via Deadline) that Lionsgate is planning to shop a new John Wick show to networks in the future.

That's all Burns had to say on the subject. It would be the second John Wick TV show following The Continental, which aired as a three-part miniseries in 2023. Ian McShane, who starred as Winston in the John Wick films, said this was a cash grab and that the filmmakers were not involved.

It's no surprise that Lionsgate would want to expand upon the popular Jo

title: Spider-Man's Kirsten Dunst Says She Would Make Another Superhero Movie "Because You Get Paid A Lot Of Money"
description:
Kirsten Dunst famously played Mary Jane alongside Tobey Maguire in the Sam Raimi Spider-Man films, but the actress hasn't returned to the superhero space since. Could that change? Speaking to Marie Claire, Dunst said "yes" when asked if she would come back in some way.

"Because you get paid a lot of money, and I have two children, and I support my mother," she said.

Dunst played Mary Jane in Spider-Man, Spider-Man 2, and Spider-Man 3. After she wrapped up her run with Spider-Man 3 in 2007, she made smaller movies like Melancholia and On the Road. After those, she appeared in the Oscar-nominated movie Hidden Figures, and then starred on the TV show On Becoming a God in Central Florida. In 2021, she earned an Academy Award nomination for her starring role in the Netflix movie The Power of the Dog.

title: Final Destination 6 Begins Filming, Aiming To Cheat Death In 2025
description:
Teenagers with precognitive abilities beware because a new Final Destination film has begun filming. Production for the Warner Bros. and New Line Cinema horror film, titled Final Destination: Bloodlines, kicked off this week and its targeted 2025 release window was confirmed by producer Craig Perry.

"After a long, hard slog through the pandemic and the strikes, Day One is finally in the can," Perry said on his Facebook account (via Bloody Disgusting). "2025 will mark the 25th-anniversary of the release of the first installment in the franchise. To honor the occasion with another worldwide theatrical release--in IMAX, no less--is a rare and wonderful thing."

Directed by Zach Lipovsky and Adam B. Stein, Final Destination: Bloodlines is the sixth film in the series, with its last entry being Final Dest

title: Here's Your First Look At The New Ninja Turtles Game
description:
Outright Games, the publisher of the upcoming Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed, has shared some images of the upcoming game set in the same world as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem film.

As you'd expect, players will have the option to play as one of the four turtles as they explore the streets (and sewers) of New York City. According to a press release, the game will be a "story-driven 3D Brawler/Platformer."

title: Nintendo Will Give $10 To The Top 310 Mario Kart Players On Mario Day
description:
Nintendo has announced the Mario Kart 8 Deluxe Open, which will take place this year on Mario Day--March 10. The top 310 players who compete across the day will be awarded 1000 My Nintendo Gold Points, equivalent to $10.

The tournament will run from 12pm to 6pm PST on March 10, and will be open to anyone who has access to a Nintendo Switch with Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, and a Nintendo Switch Online membership. Players who want to enter can search the tournament code to take part in the race.

Here are the details Nintendo has provided for the tournament:

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: MLB The Show 24 Introduces First-Ever Career Mode With Women Players
description:
MLB The Show 24 will let you create and play as a woman for the first time in the series history, with Road to the Show: Women Pave Their Way, a new addition to the Road to the Show Mode. As well as charting the player character's path to fame, the Women Pave Their Way mode will also feature a unique storyline featuring an original female character and her ongoing friendship with the player.

Just like the classic RTTS mode, players will be able to create their own character and follow a unique, personalised story of their own rise through the world of professional baseball.

In an interview published on the PlayStation blog, narrative designer Mollie Braley explained that the new mode was inspired by stories of real women in baseball, and was created in consultation with some of the ind

title: Matt Stone On Why South Park: Snow Day Is Nothing Like The Previous Games
description:
South Park: Snow Day! is nothing like the two South Park RPGs that preceded it, with its 3D animated aesthetic, its co-op battle gameplay, and even its surprisingly cheap $30 price tag. The move away from epic-scale, in-depth RPGs was a deliberate choice, says co-creator Matt Stone, and gives them the freedom to do some new things with the South Park gaming franchise.

"We came off of The Fractured But Whole, and we definitely wanted to do another video game, but we wanted to do something different," Stone said in an interview with IGN. "We started talking about doing something a little different, more about replayability. More about being able to update characters. We always thought we wanted to do that thing where we do a thing in a show and then like, it's in the game two weeks later, or three weeks, or wha

title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth - How To Date Barret At The Gold Saucer
description:
Just like in the original Final Fantasy VII that released in 1997, a big scene in Final Fantasy VII Rebirth gives you the chance to join one of the members of your party on a "date" at the Gold Saucer. Rebirth reworks that scene to be less about a rivalry between Tifa and Aerith for Cloud's affections, and more of a measure of your bond with your favorite characters and the friendships you've developed with them. While Tifa and Aerith's scenes are the only romantic ones, you can also bro down with Barret, who--as usual--has some words of wisdom for Cloud as their friendship deepens. Of course, spoilers abound from here on out.

How to date Barret in Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth

title: Halo Infinite Goes Cyberpunk With Operation Cyber Showdown III Rewards
description:
Halo Infinite has kicked off its second Operation of the year. Unlike the Spirit Of Fire Operation, 343 Industries is stepping away from pre-established armor and is stepping more into the cyberpunk aesthetic once again with Cyber Showdown III. Like other premium passes in Halo, this one will never expire, so you don't need to complete it before the next Operation comes out.

Cyber Showdown III can be claimed anytime from the in-game store. In addition to receiving new cosmetic items, the latest Operation does introduce Elevation, a new arena map that's meant to be played with a sm

title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Scavenger Hunt Quest Guide
description:
Disney Dreamlight Valley has plenty of fun quests to do as you help your villagers settle into their new home. If you've already invited Mike and Sulley to your valley and reached friendship level 10 with the latter, you'll get "The Scavenger Hunt" quest. This one has a few tricky parts, so follow our guide below for everything you need to know.

How to complete the Scavenger Hunt in Disney Dreamlight Valley

When you reach friendship level 10 with Sulley, he'll offer you "The Scavenger Hunt" quest, first tasking you with inviting some villagers to join in on the hunt. When you're ready to get started, track down and speak to the following characters:

  • Vanellope
  • Olaf
  • Stitch
  • Donald (optional, and he turns you down anyway)

When you'v
